This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
Code
Display
2964-5 Specific gravity of Body fluid
2965-2 Specific gravity of Urine
38875-1 INR in Unspecified specimen by Coagulation assay|INR in Platelet poor plasma or blood by Coagulation assay
9322-9 Cholesterol.total/Cholesterol in HDL [Percentile]
